title: AppsFlyer Integration POST request schema
description: Sent when a shareLink is clicked and the AppsFlyer integration is on

tenantAlias.description: Tenant from which the given shareLink is from

programId.title: Program Id
programId.description: The Id of the program the given shareLink is from

referralCode.title: Referral Code
referralCode.description: The Referrers code that will be used by the referred for the referral

shareLink.title: Share Link
shareLink.description: The referrer's shareLink clicked by the referred for the referral

referrer.description: The Referrer user who is associated with the shareLink that was clicked on

imageUrl.title: Image Url
imageUrl.description: The URL to an image of this user

integrationConfig.title: Integration Configuration
integrationConfig.description: A map of programs to links

^[a-zA-Z0-9-]{1,64}$.title: Link
^[a-zA-Z0-9-]{1,64}$.description: The AppsFlyer link associated with the given program

downstreamUrl.title: Down Stream Link
downstreamUrl.description: The link that the user would be redirected to in absence of an integration

signupUrl.title: Signup Link
signupUrl.description: The original URL which has not been changed or processed by any integrations
